Html:
Hello! I am developing an application in Silverlight that will need two-step verification. For this I am using silverlight control and the application that will generate the codes is Google Authenticator.

The problem I'm having is that Google Authenticator is not recognizing the QRCode generated. The text string is something like:

otpauth://totp/Label?secret=secretKey (16 characters)

But to if I use any other class (for a Windows application), as shown here (http://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=WriteableBitmapRenderer&referringTitle=Renderer) to generate QRCode, works perfectly.

I do not think it's a problem in silverlight class, because any QRCode Scanner reads perfectly the image.

Has anyone had any similar problem? Or what can it be?

PS .: To read the QRCode am using this program https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.srowen.bs.android

PS.: Sorry my bad english :)
